title: Open a new position in MarketMove [MOVE]
body:
**Proposal for:** MarketMove [MOVE]

Platform that offers “a one-stop solution for investing on the BSC network” with AI-driven contract audits, the ability to place limit orders & stop-loss orders on PancakeSwap, & trackers for social media activity / whales to identify scams.


### Technical details

- **Token Name:** MarketMove [MOVE]
- **Token Address:** 0x231cf6f78620e42fe00d0c5c3088b427f355d01c
- **Token Type:** Token
- **Token Chain** Binance Smart Chain
- **Stage:** Launched
- **Link to the whitepaper:** https://docs.google.com/document/d/1amabajPf9fFT2Hb2NEmFN3OKXyeTuxwldYTN1zu7_dE/view
- **Team doxxed:** Yes
- **Proof of dox:** https://marketmove.ai/#Team
- **Smart contract public:** Yes
- **Audit:** No
- **LP Lock:** Yes
- **LP Lock proof:** https://bscscan.com/token/0x231cf6f78620e42fe00d0c5c3088b427f355d01c?a=0x4547f9a84b2e6305eeb7e0d5768e60e98911f62e#tokenInfo

### Functional details

MarketMove aims to revolutionize BSC by offering a “one-stop solution” app with the following features:

*MARKETBoard:*

- Leverages AI to let you find new promising tokens by combining data from the BSC blockchain with tokens’ social media presence. Updated every 30 seconds to show you trending tokens and presales from multiple platforms (DXSale, Unicrypt, and others);

- Allows users to save tokens they find interesting to the “Favorite” tab to stay up to date.

- Shows users information about tokens they already own and their price action.
 
- Allows users tp set email or Telegram alerts to easily track the price even before CoinMarketCap listings.


*AI-driven contract audit*

- “MarketMove uses BERT (developed by Google), GPT-3 (developed by OpenAI), along with our proprietary algorithms to show you exactly what each function in the contract does. The model was trained on more than 97,000 smart contracts and manually labeled. This way, we describe each function in a very simple language. Even your grandpa will be able to understand what blacklist or mint functions mean.”

- “It scans contracts for potential risk factors, which could result in a rug pull or honeypot.”

- “The engine includes a glossary of the most popular terms related to smart contracts. We don’t want you to solely rely on MarketMove. We want to teach you what honeypots are and how to spot them on your own.”


*AI-driven presale audit*

- “It lets you automatically audit presales from multiple platforms, analyzing their liquidity, supply, lockers, tokens held outside the presale, and multiple other factors.
We will initially support DXSale and Unicrypt. Additional platforms will be added.”

*Social media tracker*

- “Every 30 seconds, our social media tracker scrapes data from Twitter, Reddit, Telegram, and 4chan to provide you with a full overview of social media presence for tokens you select.”

- Filter the activity by custom date ranges.

- Set email and Telegram notifications for trending tokens based on selected criteria (e.g. number of social media mentions growing exponentially, members on a Telegram group tripled in the last 24 hours). 

- Include custom keywords for notifications. With “private sale”, you will never miss out on a one again.

*Whale watcher*

- “We believe that the data itself is useless. We don’t care what specific number of tokens a whale just dumped or bought. We care how it affects the price and how it can affect it in the future. It is especially important when the volume is high.”

- MarketMove provides a ranking of whales for your favorite tokens, paired with their transactions, and to what extent each of those transactions affected the price (displayed in %).

- It also displays how many tokens a whale still owns and how it can potentially affect the price if he wanted to dump.

*Limit & stop-loss orders*
- Place limit buy, limit sell, and stop-loss orders on PancakeSwap and other exchanges.

- Set slippage manually or use our auto-calculate feature to make sure your transaction goes through.

- Scheduled DCA buy and sell orders.

- Email and Telegram notifications after executing each transaction.

- Optional feature to automatically activate or deactivate a stop-loss order if the price fluctuates too much, paired with volume and number of sellers. You will be able to use a selected threshold (e.g. “deactivate my stop-loss if the >15% dump was caused by only 1 seller).

*Presale & Launch Snipers*
- To find new coins with potential & get in on the ground floor.


## Fund allocation and personal opinion

This coin has a novel use case that has the potential to make crypto much more accessible to the everyday person. It aims to solve some pervasive problems with BSC & exchanges like PancakeSwap, and does it in a way that makes crypto more approachable than ever. The team has experience developing AI for Fotune 100 companies, is doxxed, holds no developer wallets, and holds frequent AMA’s. 

I propose a small, long-term investment in MOVE, which plans to have a strong marketing campaign & release v2 of their app in early 2022. 

This is not a moonshot coin, this is not a coin that already has a massive market cap, this is a coin with the potential to go far. A small investment today can be a big payoff tomorrow.
author: 0xF21494adfbf8D4332F540E3a819280eE5D22BB8F
